name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Angular Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in developing dynamic, high-performance applications utilizing **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind**. My proficiency in responsive design and Agile methodologies ensures that I deliver user-focused solutions that enhance functionality and usability. I am well-versed in Scrum frameworks, driving collaborative projects that yield impactful results.
Additionally, my experience includes building full-stack solutions using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and implementing CI/CD automation strategies to ensure smooth and secure deployments. My background in healthcare and financial sectors has equipped me with a strong understanding of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, enabling me to create applications that meet critical regulatory requirements. My problem-solving skills are complemented by my ability to integrate AI/ML capabilities, manage cloud environments in **AWS** and **Azure**, and develop robust microservices architecture.
